column2: Hide Propaganda Campaigns

Depending on our government and ideology, we may have up to ten available propaganda campaigns to choose from, which can clutter the decisions window. If you're not interested in reviewing your propaganda options at this time, you can pick this decision to hide them from the political decisions list. Don't worry, you can toggle them back on if you'd like.
Show Propaganda Campaigns

Depending on our government and ideology, we may have up to ten available propaganda campaigns to choose from. If you would like to review them, you can pick this decision to show them all in the political decisions list. If it gets too cluttered, you can toggle them back off if you'd like.
Broadcast Social Democrat Propaganda

A large cadre of artists, activists and socially-minded folks have been actively spreading social democratic values in $COUNTRY_ADJ$ communities. With a bit of government funding and official backing, we may expand their reach across the masses.
Broadcast Anti-Social Democrat Propaganda

Of all the dangers of our nation, none is more pernicious than the Social Democrats. Despite the inherent contradictions of their ideology-straddling beliefs, a significant portion of our people follow them, and we ought to show them the errors of their views.
Broadcast Socialist Propaganda

There is a spectre haunting $COUNTRY$, the spectre of socialism. And you can hear its revolutionary voice at workplaces, restaurants, and even at home. Is it not our duty to amplify these voices, for the sake of our nation, our citizens, and of all mankind?
Broadcast Anti-Socialist Propaganda

No one likes a Socialist. Too moderate for true Marxists, and too radical for the liberals and conservatives. Yet, they exist in significant numbers among us, and we ought to enact a propaganda campaign to reduce their influence on our politics.
Broadcast Communist Propaganda

Workers of $COUNTRY$, unite! The Vanguard Party is here to bear the torch of Marxism-Leninism, shining our new path towards the establishment of a Socialist State, and of a just, humanist, prosperous world. We must fire up the Agitprop presses and remind our comrades of this fact!
Broadcast Anti-Communist Propaganda

Radical Communists don't want change, they want destruction. Destruction of our way of life, of our institutions, of our freedoms. Despite the self-evident destructive nature, a large portion of our population follows them! We ought to publicize their failures and dangers to the public at large.
Broadcast Liberal Propaganda

From the large business owner to the humble blue collar worker, through our rising wages, educational achievements and economic growth, we are showing the world that a free, pluralistic society is better than the alternatives. Let our products and our values be our ambassadors, both in $COUNTRY$ and abroad.
Broadcast Anti-Liberal Propaganda

Liberalism as a whole is but a weak and decadent byproduct of all the issues of the 20th Century. Yet, several of our citizens follow such selfish ideology! By showing them the vices and pitfalls of a liberal society, we may be able to correct their ways.
Broadcast Libertarian Propaganda

In a society where the successful are eloquent, there is little reason for propaganda, our endeavors speak for themselves. However, not everybody thinks that way, deluded by the false idols of tradition and collectivism. So let us spotlight our achievements!
Broadcast Anti-Libertarian Propaganda

What is libertarianism but peak selfishness? Man is a wolf to man, and shunning the common good for the individual is a recipe for societal collapse. We ought to remind our citizens of the importance of the collective through community-building and mass media.
Broadcast Green Propaganda

The events of the last few decades have acted as a grim reminder of the importance of our only planet. As such, several members of our community, from the schools to the sciences, from the fields to the cities, raised their voices for Mother Earth, and we are listening.
Broadcast Anti-Green Propaganda

The Green Party is nothing but ecological extremism. The needs of the trees and the wilderness cannot be above the needs of our citizens and their lives, and we must spread the message of reason and mankind's progress to the masses who refuse to acknowledge this.
Broadcast Conservative Propaganda

Several popular authors have written about the moral fibre of $COUNTRY$. We may not be perfect, but our strength resides in our steadfast values, and we must not forget them. With official lauds, we can enshrine them in our communities, libraries, and houses of worship.
Broadcast Anti-Conservative Propaganda

To think we are perfect just as we are is arrogance, and the people from all over the country are clamoring for change, and to call for the conservative Old Guard to retire and make way for a younger generation with new ideas.
Broadcast Nationalist Propaganda

They're saying it everywhere - on the streets of $CAPITAL$, in the schools across the nation, on every family's dinner table - $COUNTRY$ is back! Their displays of patriotism are an integral part of our national cohesion, and as such, they should receive full government support.
Broadcast Anti-Nationalist Propaganda

It was Einstein who said it best: nationalism is a disease, the measles of mankind. It is not driven by love of our country but for hate of the others, and, ironically, it can tear us apart. We ought to temper the effusive chauvinism from some of our citizens, for our nation's sake.
Broadcast Traditionalist Propaganda

As a tree grows towards the sky, its roots bury deeper into the ground. As we grow as a nation, we must not forget our roots and traditional values that led us here, and that will continue to guide us to a brighter tomorrow, with faith and prosperity for all.
Broadcast Anti-Traditionalist Propaganda

Living in the past may be cozy, but it is no way to lead a nation. People change, societies change, and values change. A significant portion of our society holds these antiquated ideas, but the shining light of progress shall see through the error of their ways.
Broadcast Ultranationalist Propaganda

Providence has blessed $COUNTRY$ with the best country on Earth, with fertile lands, abundant resources, and incompetent enemies. Sometimes, some people forget, and using the latest tools of mass media, the State ought to remind them.
Broadcast Anti-Ultranationalist Propaganda

A significant portion of our citizens supports the most extreme forms of nationalism, where the ends justify the means and all ethics is subordinated to their ideal of $COUNTRY$. We must engage in strong civic campaigns to stop this toxic super-nationalism.
